tns:patch.keyword: Change url to new report generator
tns:patch.author: ginchauspe
tns:patch.description: Change menu entry for tab generator.

script.lang: UPDATE amp_menu_entry SET url = '/TEMPLATE/reampv2/build/index.html#/report_generator?profile=R' WHERE url LIKE '/reportWizard.do?tabs=false&reset=true'; UPDATE amp_menu_entry SET url = '/TEMPLATE/reampv2/build/index.html#/report_generator?profile=R&type=P' WHERE url LIKE '/reportWizard.do?tabs=false&reset=true&type=5';
